text:
@marcorubio How many Generations do you have invested in Our U.S.A?

I can't tell from the utter denial of #COVID19 on @FoxNews. How they & @Facebook make folks hate foreigners until becoming crazed about it.

125,000 AMERICANS have died bc of EPIC stupidity by Trump & @GOP.

Sit down. https://t.co/9DLKKTDWnZ
